Hi frank,
 
Wouldn't you be waiting for "paranormal PURLE"
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 4/28/2008 1:34:04 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
I'm waitng for paranormal "pink" research. So were you able to  
determine which envoronmental change caused the voice/amswer?  

F-S

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
leongbabe@..,  le
>
> Hi Rees,
> 
> I just got  my paranormal puck a couple of days ago and in regular 
people 
>  terms, it takes readings from the environment: EMF (man-made and 
natural),  
> voltage, frequency, and temperature, and translate those readings  
into words from 
> a 2,000 word dictionary. It also logs all the  readings on a 
spreadsheet. 
> You can also set alarms and  threshholds for spikes, and well as 
incorporate a 
> PC camera or  audio device to record pictures, video or audio 
whenever your 
>  alarms are reached. It's a very interesting device. One of the 
first  
> questions I asked it was "Who are you?" It answered "Edison,  
reincarnation"rein
> brought it to a meeting today of the group  I belong to, the San 
Francisco Ghost 
> Society, and when our  resident psychic asked it "What's my 
name?" It replied 
> with the  word "Medium". Like I said, it's a very interesting 
device, 
>  indeed! The inventor refers to the device not as an ITC device, 
but  rather, a ECM 
> device -- for Environmental Communications Mode, as it  is driven 
purely from 
> environmental data alone. 
> 
>  Sharon
> 
> 
> 
> ************ ************<WBR>**Need a new ride?  Check out the larg
used car 
> listings at AOL  Autos.
